attributes.action: not charge TAX on Fuel for Police Vehicles.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Police dont pay for road tax so why pay for the duty on the fuel. To allow Police Vehicles to purchase Non duty fuel would surely save thousands and the money saved could go towards fightin crime ad boosting public confidence. The money after all comes from the Public and Government so why not save it and ive a little back to an already stuggling Police Force ?
